getCharacterAdvance

Integer getCharacterAdvance(char currentCharacter,
                            char nextCharacter,
                            float size)
Return the advance of the given character including kerning information.

Parameters:
currentCharacter - current character
nextCharacter - next character
size - font size
Returns:
